TopicTitle: [WIP - 0.25] Squad HD Re-texture Project - Continuous Release (July 25)

Articles.Content: I think you should. I don't like the default colours.
Welp, Solids First
Looking good.
I forgot to say, I really like those textures. I'm actually using stock engines now

I forgot to say, I really like those textures. I'm actually using stock engines now

Looks like it worked

Here's an Update:

Sorry If I slowed down a bit, got a new project up.
Looks great as always. I feel that it needs sligtly more color, though.
Yep. That's what you get for juggling mods all around. I actually couldn't think straight about the design. Aerojet Kerbodyne is stockalike. This is KWalike.
<3 at RT-10. I'll feel so much better about using them now. Can't wait for the BACC!

<3 at RT-10. I'll feel so much better about using them now. Can't wait for the BACC!

I actually like the BACC so much

Remember we aren't done with Phase I yet so we continue with engines for now
dem SRB's. Love it!

A special request: could you do up a RT-10 and a BACC in Soviet green? (Also, if you could remove all ribbing from the normal map for the BACC; I'm pretending they're monobloc not segmented solids...). It's for RftS, where Imperial Russia was big on solids. The KWalike ones are great for the "civilian" versions.
Of course we can do that. I'll see what I can do

Aw, thanks so much!

Expect it to be prominently featured in RftS, as soon as I make the next chapters.
Hmmm, maybe I'll release the 2 srbs with those textures as soon as I finish them because I think I'm a little bit busy to be able to release it sooner than you might expect.
Just like to say wow !!!! put this in and wow, I'll have to stop delete stock parts out of the game's if there going to look like this great job thanks.
Happy that my Yes to Squad campaign is working.

I'll have to put this on hold guys, I don't want to not finish any mod because Im juggling around too much. Aerojet Kerbodyne's time for now. This already has Alpha Release. Once I release it, I'll be back.
Oh I haven't seen these before, they're looking good. Nice job
I was expecting those fantastic srb... But good luck in your new project.

Oh I haven't seen these before, they're looking good. Nice job

Thanks man

I was expecting those fantastic srb... But good luck in your new project.

Well, you're doing nice, Proot, you're re-texturing Squad as, well, right? I'm glad to start the movement (If I was the one), that Mk.1-2 pod looks great.

Well, you're doing nice, Proot, you're re-texturing Squad as, well, right? I'm glad to start the movement (If I was the one), that Mk.1-2 pod looks great.

Oh, no! I've only do that pod, the big decoupler, and the big grey tanks (because I hate them, lol). Oh! and the legs! (because I always end up using the stock ones). And in a Squad/Nasa style.

But I'm in L-O-V-E (and using over stock) your engine textures!

Edited April 9, 2014 by Proot

Oh, no! I've only do that pod, the big decoupler, and the big grey tanks (because I hate them, lol). Oh! and the legs! (because I always end up using the stock ones). And in a Squad/Nasa style.

But I'm in L-O-V-E (and using over stock) your engine textures!

Well, If only they had your FX!

Are, in fact, Nazari1382's effects. I've only using my own textures and tweak configs for Squad's flames and smokes, with his "Hot Rockets!" .MU files. But I can do any new texture for FX that you want! Just tell me!
Hmmm, sure, think I should learn how to do some of those too! It looks bad ass.

Hmmm, sure, think I should learn how to do some of those too! It looks bad ass.

For flames I usually use a single blurried spot (in the color you want). Then I apply any type of distortion effect which after, in the particle graphics "accumulation", looks more like real small flame "thonges" (Is that expression well done in english?).

Smoke is even much more easy: just make your own brush for the effect and then use it in a single color, that avoid the "accumulation" of dark "glitches" in the smoke effect, given it an much more smooth look.
